titles.title: Coventional Arms Threat Reduction Act of 2004
A bill to provide for the elimination and safeguarding of conventional arms.
Coventional Arms Threat Reduction Act of 2004
CATRA (Coventional Arms Threat Reduction Act of 2004)

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Conventional Arms Threat Reduction Act of 2004 - Directs the Secretary of State to carry out an accelerated global program to secure or eliminate stocks of man-portable air defense systems (MANPADS), other conventional weapons, tactical missile systems, and related equipment and facilities that pose a proliferation threat.
Establishes within the Department of State an Office of Conventional Arms Threat Reduction which shall formulate policy on conventional arms threat reduction and plan and administer arms reduction programs.
